transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello Javed ji Namaskar sir.
Customer: Namaskar.
Executive: Manish Sharma baat kar raha hu aapka account manager India Mart ke office se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Kaise hain Javed sir?
Customer: Badhiya sir.
Executive: Tabiyat thik thak hai sir? Aawaz dabi dabi aa rahi hai aapki.
Customer: Ha tabiyat kharab hai.
Executive: Kahan ghar pe hain ki kahin side pe?
Customer: Side pe tha.
Executive: Tabiyat kharab hai fir bhi side pe chale ja rahe hain Javed ji. Aaram to kar lijiye. Main manta hu kaam aapka daud bhag ka hai aur daud bhag isliye kiya jata hai sir. Ha. Ye kya keh rahe the Javed sir thoda sa catalog na shutdown hua hai hamara. Right uska karan hai na pichle ek hafte mein aapne ek bhi lead nahi consume kiya hai sir. Jab se aapne mujhe detail bheji hai detail main update bhi karwa raha hu dhire dhire. Thik hai? Maine beech mein aapko ek din call bhi kiya tha par aapne call mera nahi uthaya. Aapne dekha hoga miss call padi hogi.
Customer: Hmm. Pehle maine dhyan nahi diya.
Executive: Dhyan nahi diya tha aapne koi baat nahi. Ek kaam kariyega sir. Abhi jaise thoda sa free rahiyega na pehle number to koi bhi ek lead consume kijiyega thik hai?
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ha dusra number sir wo jo aapne mujhe PDF diya tha na sir. Ji ji. Wo bilkul hi achcha bana hai sir par thoda sa usme mistake ho gaya hai sir. I think ya to maine nahi bataya tha ya to matlab wo by mistake ho gayi mistake to kuch nahi aapne apne side se achcha kiya hai. Hua kya hai na sir aapne usme apna mobile number mention kar diya hai sir.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ha aur mobile number koi bhi PDF ho ya koi bhi product ki photo ho na India Mart wo upload nahi karta hai apne software pe sir.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To ye sir aapne khud se banaya tha Javed sir ya banwaya tha?
Customer: Banwaya tha.
Executive: Thik hai to paisa nahi lega bas usse bol diya ki bhai yaar wo software pe upload nahi ho raha hai bas wo number hata do hamari company ka ye mera naam rehne do bas number hata do. Bahut hi achcha bana hai sir main laga dunga main lagwa dunga na matlab cheeze matlab koi bhi customer dekhega na to do minute ke liye aapse baat karenge ki Javed ji ye kya hai ye kaisa hai ye kaisa hai sari baat kar raha hai. Baki jo aapne mujhe photo diya hai wo bhi upload karwa raha hu. Ha Javed sir agar possible hai to ek minute ke liye India Mart open kar sakte hain kya app? Kyunki ek chota sa ek aur correction hai wo main karwa deta hu wo ek minute ka kaam hai.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Valid wale page pe jaiye.
Customer: Sir isme aawaz nahi aa payegi. Main 4 baje call karu?
Executive: 4 baje?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To ek kaam kariye abhi India Mart open kiya hai to ek lead consume kar lijiyega isse lage hath thik hai? Fir main aapko 4 baje bhi connect kar lunga thik hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Catalog shutdown due to not consuming leads.

- PDF catalog has mobile number, not allowed.

- Needs to make a correction in IndiaMART app.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for catalog shutdown.

- Asked to remove mobile number from PDF catalog.

- Will assist with correction in IndiaMART app.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will consume a lead.

- Executive will call back at 4:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, leads, pdf, mobile number, app
